_meanings:
{@--1@} To fetch, bring
near; {#teBya imaM balimupAkaroti#} <ls>Āśval.</ls>
{@--2@} To summon, invite. 
{@--3@} To 
deliver. offer, grant, bestow, give
(to another); {#gosahasramupAkuru#} <ls>Rām.</ls>
{@--4@} To acquire, obtain (as fame).
{@--5@} To bring about, make 
preparations for a sacred rite; perform a
rite; <ls>Ms. 4. 95</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">5. 7</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 171.</ls>
{@--6@} To undertake, begin, enter upon.
